thread.title: Baseball: Royals' Volquez silences Blue Jays' bats in ALCS opener
thread.title_full: Baseball: Royals' Volquez silences Blue Jays' bats in ALCS opener

author: Associated Press
title: Baseball: Royals' Volquez silences Blue Jays' bats in ALCS opener
text:
Baseball: Royals' Volquez silences Blue Jays' bats in ALCS opener Associated Press Posted: 10/16/2015 08:26:46 PM PDT Updated: 10/16/2015 08:26:48 PM PDT KANSAS CITY -- Edinson Volquez held the powerful Toronto Blue Jays bats to two hits over six scoreless innings, and the Kansas City Royals got a leg up in the American League Championship Series with a 5-0 win Friday night. 
Check back for more on this developing story. ALCS SCHEDULE
